content.text:
# Draft:WPA Men's world ranking

The''' WPA Men's world pool rankings''' are the official system of ranking professional Pool (cue sports) players to determine automatic qualification and seeding for tournaments sanctioned by the World Pool Association.
Ranking system
The ranking is based on the finishing positions of the players in official WPA sanctioned tournaments.
It is also used to determine the seeding of the players for the World Championships in nine-ball, eight-ball  & ten-ball
